name: df-rag
body: |- wceq(crag, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cword(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat3), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), nat2)), co(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), nat2))))))))
comment: Define the class of right angles. Definition 8.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 57. See ~ israg . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2019.)
